alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, southwestern Forest, southwestern Vilas, Oneida and northwestern Langlade Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rainbow Flowage to 7 miles northwest of Pearson to 7 miles southwest of Antigo. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Veterans Memorial County Park around 305 PM CDT. Pearson around 310 PM CDT. Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of the showers and storms include Rhinelander, Hazelhurst, Monico,Elcho, Summit Lake, Woodlawn and Crystal Lake Scout Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
